page.title: 17CAYTON HOME LIFE SURVEY (1)
page.content: We gave parents a questionnaire about home and leisure. The results are : Mr and Mrs "Average Cayton" are aged between 30 and 40 with Mr Cayton 1 to 5 years older than his wife.They own their own home. He is either a skilled worker or professional. She looks after the home. He spends his spare time taking part in sports or games, do it yourself, watching T.V. or gardening. She reads, watches T.V. or gardens. She is only slightly less likely to smoke than he is and has a 1 in 3 chance of doing so.They are more likely to holiday in Britain but the holiday abroad is nearly as popular. They have 2 children and use the countryside around for leisure a lot. Mostly they use supermarkets to shop. They eat mainly home cooking rather than convenience foods and are as likely to drink either tea or coffee.
